areValuesEqual.description: A function that compares a new value with the internal value of the slider. The internal value is potentially unsorted, e.g. to support frozen arrays: https://github.com/mui/material-ui/pull/28472

minStepsBetweenValues.description: The minimum steps between values in a range slider.

percentageValues.description: The value(s) of the slider as percentages

rootRef.description: The ref attached to the control area of the Slider.

step.description: The step increment of the slider when incrementing or decrementing. It will snap to multiples of this value. Decimal values are supported.

subitems.description: A map containing all the Thumb components registered to the slider
